term.title: agglutination

item.text: An immunochemical reaction leading to the aggregation of particulate matter such as bacteria, erythrocytes or other cells, or synthetic particles such as plastic beads coated with antigens or antibodies.

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 145 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)
